title: The best science fiction TV shows to stream right now
description: From Chernobyl to Watchmen, this is the best sci-fi on Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and BBC iPlayer at the moment
content:
Jared Hared stars in Chernobyl as a troubled investigator
Liam Daniel/HBO
Chernobyl
Streaming on NOW TV and Sky Go in the UK and on HBO in the US
Never judge a book by its cover. Screenwriter Craig Mazin was best known for writing sequels to The Hangover … [+12053 chars]
